LASV_Dewdrop_Fish.Name: Dewdrop Fish
LASV_Dewdrop_Fish.Description: An ancient fish named for its shape.

LASV_Purple_Spotted_Trout.Name: Purple Spotted Trout
LASV_Purple_Spotted_Trout.Description: A freshwater fish not found in the human world.

LASV_Relicantlette.Name: Relicantlette
LASV_Relicantlette.Description: A common fish found in ancient lakes.

LASV_Serafin.Name: Serafin
LASV_Serafin.Description: A pretty fish with wing-like fins.

LASV_Umuwi_Carp.Name: Umuwi Carp
LASV_Umuwi_Carp.Description: A rare fish found in Umuwi. It seems to radiate magic.

LASV_Umuwi_Aster.Name: Umuwi Aster
LASV_Umuwi_Aster.Description: A local fall flower that blooms in Umuwi. Comes in many colors.

LASV_Umuwi_Badak.Name: Umuwi Badak
LASV_Umuwi_Badak.Description: An ovate orange yam. Has a sweet flavor with a touch of chestnut.

LASV_Umuwi_Calamansi.Name: Umuwi Calamansi
LASV_Umuwi_Calamansi.Description: A small round citrus fruit that is found in the fields of Umuwi all year round.

LASV_Umuwi_Makahiya.Name: Umuwi Makahiya
LASV_Umuwi_Makahiya.Description: A thorny flower with leaves that shut close whenever it is touched.

LASV_Umuwi_Olive.Name: Umuwi Olive
LASV_Umuwi_Olive.Description: A variant of olive that has a spicy aftertaste!

LASV_Umuwi_Poinsettia.Name: Umuwi Poinsettia
LASV_Umuwi_Poinsettia.Description: A flower that blooms in the cold dirt of Umuwi. Popular among female shadowfolk and werewolves.

LASV_Umuwi_Sampaguita.Name: Umuwi Sampaguita
LASV_Umuwi_Sampaguita.Description: A local summer flower that blooms in Umuwi. Has a faint fragrance to it.

LASV_Eggroot.Name: Eggroot
LASV_Eggroot.Description: An egg-shaped root crop that has a rich and savory flavor.

LASV_Ghost_Cabbage.Name: Ghost Cabbage
LASV_Ghost_Cabbage.Description: You can almost see through its leaves.

LASV_Pale_Berry.Name: Pale Berry
LASV_Pale_Berry.Description: A pale purple-colored berry that has a soothing sweet aftertaste.

LASV_Sour_Potato.Name: Sour Potato
LASV_Sour_Potato.Description: A variation of potato grown in Umuwi. It tastes sour.

LASV_Thorn_Pepper.Name: Thorn Pepper
LASV_Thorn_Pepper.Description: A thorny and bitter species of pepper.

LASV_Umuwi_Lanzones.Name: Umuwi Lanzones
LASV_Umuwi_Lanzones.Description: A small fruit high in antioxidants, vitamins, and protein.

LASV_Umuwi_Rambutan.Name: Umuwi Rambutan
LASV_Umuwi_Rambutan.Description: A red, plum-sized fruit with soft spines and a slightly acidic taste.

LASV_EmbraceFruit.Name: EmbraceFruit
LASV_EmbraceFruit.Description: A fruit as warm as Bianka's presence. It seems to reduce pain for a few seconds.

LASV_HastePill.Name: HastePill
LASV_HastePill.Description: A magic pill of haste formulated by Raphael and you. Gives extreme speed for a few seconds.

LASV_LuckyMint.Name: LuckyMint
LASV_LuckyMint.Description: A mint candy imbued with Lunna's ancient magic. It increases luck dramatically for a short period of time.

LASV_Pale_Berry_Pie.Name: Pale Berry Pie
LASV_Pale_Berry_Pie.Description: A pie filled with Umuwi's Pale Berries. It has a very sweet aftertaste!

LASV_Sour_Hashbrown.Name: Sour Hashbrown
LASV_Sour_Hashbrown.Description: A unique-tasting potato made into a hashbrown!

LASV_Umuwi_Mash.Name: Umuwi Mash
LASV_Umuwi_Mash.Description: A spicy, starchy mash good for a cold winter day!

LASV_Umuwi_Salad.Name: Umuwi Salad
LASV_Umuwi_Salad.Description: A salad made with Umuwi produce. It has a sweet savory taste!

LASV_Eggroot_Seeds.Name: Eggroot Seeds
LASV_Eggroot_Seeds.Description: Plant in spring. Takes 14 days to produce Eggroot.

LASV_Ghost_Cabbage_Seeds.Name: Ghost Cabbage Seeds
LASV_Ghost_Cabbage_Seeds.Description: Plant in fall. Takes 8 days to produce Ghost Cabbage.

LASV_Pale_Berry_Seeds.Name: Pale Berry Seeds
LASV_Pale_Berry_Seeds.Description: Plant in spring. Takes 6 days to produce Pale Berries and regrows after harvest.

LASV_Sour_Potato_Seeds.Name: Sour Potato Seeds
LASV_Sour_Potato_Seeds.Description: Plant in summer. Takes 8 days to produce Sour Potato.

LASV_Thorn_Pepper_Seeds.Name: Thorn Pepper Seeds
LASV_Thorn_Pepper_Seeds.Description: Plant in summer. Takes 10 days to produce Thorn Peppers and regrows after harvest.

LASV_Umuwi_Lanzones_Sapling.Name: Umuwi Lanzones Sapling
LASV_Umuwi_Lanzones_Sapling.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Lanzones tree. Ready to harvest in the summer. Only grows if the 8 surrounding tiles are empty.

LASV_Umuwi_Rambutan_Sapling.Name: Umuwi Rambutan Sapling
LASV_Umuwi_Rambutan_Sapling.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Rambutan tree. Ready to harvest in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding tiles are empty.
